text: Panna Kaiser (born 25 May 1950) is a Bangladesh Awami League politician and former member of parliament. ==Early life and career== Kaiser completed her master's in Bengali literature from the University of Dhaka in 1969. In 1996, she was selected as one of the 30 reserved seats for women to serve as a member of parliament. She has been contributing in famous and old child organization named KHELAGHAR for the long time. She also engaged in various social activities, cultural event and writeup . ==Personal life== Kaiser married Shahidullah Kaiser, a writer and a journalist on 17 February 1969. He was abducted from his home on 14 December 1971 by the paramilitary Al-Badr and was not seen again since then. She has a daughter, Shomi Kaiser, an actress and a son Amitabh Kaiser. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1950 births Category:People from Comilla District Category:University of Dhaka alumni Category:Awami League politicians Category:7th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:Women members of the Jatiya Sangsad
title: Panna Kaiser
